activities:
TalentQuest uses Personal Information (i) to provide users and their employers with Talent and Performance Management related services (e.g., performance appraisals, 360 feedback, selection assessments, succession planning, competency modeling, and/or compensation management), (ii) to respond to requests, (iii) to evaluate the quality of our services, (iv) to communicate with users about our services and related issues, and (v) for internal administrative and analytics purposes and to comply with our legal obligations, policies and procedures.
TalentQuest shares Personal Information with the Employer and among TalentQuest’s subsidiaries and affiliates. With the exception of the Employer, with whom we share Personal Information solely pursuant to, and in connection with, the services performed on the user’s behalf and as procured by the Employer, TalentQuest does not share Personal Information with third parties.  We do not use Personal Information for purposes incompatible with the purposes for which the information was originally collected without notifying the relevant consumers or customers of such uses and offering an opportunity to opt out.
